verses.name: Matthew 7:9
verses.text: Or what man is there of you, whom if his son ask bread, will he give him a stone?

verses.name: Matthew 7:10
verses.text: Or if he ask a fish, will he give him a serpent?

verses.name: Matthew 7:11
verses.text: If ye then, being evil, know how to give good gifts unto your children, how much more shall your Father which is in heaven give good things to them that ask him?

verses.name: Matthew 7:12
verses.text: Therefore all things whatsoever ye would that men should do to you, do ye even so to them: for this is the law and the prophets.
